page.title: 13Children 1985
page.content: The following information was obtained from a sample of 270 7-11 year old children in June 1985. Pocket Money,average sum per week. 10 year old.............100p 9 year old..............80p 8 year old..............88p 7 year old..............55p School Dinners, Children staying for cooked meal 28% Children bringing sandwiches.....71% Children going home for lunch.....1% Family Possessions, Foreign made cars............73% British made cars............27% Video recorder...............44% Microwave Oven...............23% Home computer................46%
